9
XML:
1. Need Supporting doc: DTD, XSL.
2. User defined - Para:
3. Browser view: Xml stylesheet
4. Data base, Data transfer
5. Multispace preserved
6. Case sensitive
7. Nested and proper close
8. Heading Levels: H1..................
